Description: Rim, neck and handle-root sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat (black-figured) pottery krater; interior: glazed at top with added red band lined in white; exterior, cream slip: upper part of a goose with outspread wings to right; red patches on wings of goose; glazed around handle root; on top of rim: meander frieze.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.513)
